dealOfWeek.subtitle: Hot & Fresh Cuisines

homeAbout.title: Fresh & Healthy, Every day!
homeAbout.heading: About Kibby’s Hot Kitchen
homeAbout.description: Kibby’s Hot Kitchen is your destination for delicious, fresh, and healthy meals. Located at Unicity Mall (KU), we serve the best flavors in town every day from 8:00 AM to 9:00 PM.

aboutPromo.line1: Get the best meals at Kibby’s Hot Kitchen...
